title: Weather Dashboard Application
description: A modern, responsive weather dashboard built with React.js featuring secure authentication, real-time weather data, and beautiful glassmorphism UI design.
longDescription: Developed a comprehensive weather dashboard application with Supabase authentication, OpenWeatherMap API integration, and a stunning glassmorphism design. The application features real-time weather updates every 30 seconds, 5-day forecasts, geolocation support, and persistent user sessions. Built with modern React patterns including Context API for state management and custom hooks for reusable logic.
features: Real-time weather data with auto-refresh every 30 seconds
Geolocation support for current location weather
Unit conversion between Celsius and Fahrenheit
Glassmorphism UI design with smooth animations
technicalHighlights: React Context API for global state management

title: WhatsApp Clone - Real-time Chat Application
description: A full-featured WhatsApp clone with real-time messaging, group chats, user management, and modern responsive interface built with Next.js and Supabase.
longDescription: Built a comprehensive real-time chat application replicating WhatsApp's core functionality. Features include instant message delivery with Supabase Realtime, group and direct chats, user authentication, persistent chat history, online status indicators, and advanced filtering. Implemented chat labels for organization, unread message counts, member management, and auto-generated avatars. The application includes automatic fallback to demo mode if database is unavailable, ensuring continuous functionality.
features: Secure user authentication with Supabase Auth
Chat labels with custom colors (Demo, Content, Signup, Internal)
Advanced filtering by type, labels, and search
technicalHighlights: Supabase Realtime for instant message delivery
Row Level Security for data protection
Optimized state management with React Hooks

title: InsureRAG - AI Insurance Q&A (Frontend)
description: Modern Next.js application for uploading insurance policies and asking complex questions using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) backend.
longDescription: Developed a sophisticated frontend for an AI-powered insurance document analysis system. The application features an intuitive drag-and-drop interface for PDF and TXT uploads with real-time feedback, a conversational AI assistant for document queries, and a transparent sources tab showing exact text snippets used for answers. Implemented persistent user experience with automatic document list restoration on page load. Built with Next.js for optimal performance and SEO, utilizing server-side rendering and automatic code-splitting.
features: Support for PDF and TXT files
Transparent sources tab with text snippets
Professional UI with Ant Design icons
technicalHighlights: Next.js SSR for faster initial load

title: InsureRAG - AI Insurance Q&A (Backend)
description: Robust FastAPI backend powering a complete Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline for insurance document analysis.
longDescription: Built a comprehensive RAG backend service handling document ingestion, validation, processing, and AI-powered chat. Implemented AI-powered validation using LLM to verify insurance-related documents before processing. Developed complete RAG workflow with text extraction from PDFs and TXT files, intelligent chunking with overlap for context retention, vector embedding generation using Google's models, and persistent cloud-based Pinecone vector storage. The system retrieves relevant document chunks based on queries and uses Gemini LLM to generate accurate, context-aware answers.
features: Robust API endpoints for upload, health, and chat
Reliable text extraction from PDF and TXT
Vector embedding generation with Google models

title: Hich Trip - Travel Planning Application
description: Modern travel planning application built with Next.js 15, featuring trip management, itinerary planning, and beautiful UI with Ant Design and Bootstrap.
longDescription: Developed a comprehensive travel planning application using the latest Next.js 15 framework with React 19. The application provides users with tools to plan, organize, and manage their trips with an intuitive interface. Integrated Ant Design for professional UI components and Bootstrap for responsive layouts. Features include trip creation, itinerary management, destination exploration, and travel recommendations. Built with modern React patterns and optimized for performance with Next.js's latest features including server components and improved routing.
features: Professional UI with Ant Design components
Modern icon library with Lucide React

title: OODL - Interactive 3D Homepage
description: Stunning interactive homepage featuring 3D graphics, animations, and modern UI built with Next.js, Three.js, and Framer Motion.
longDescription: Created an impressive, interactive homepage with cutting-edge 3D graphics and animations. Leveraged Three.js and React Three Fiber to build immersive 3D experiences directly in the browser. Implemented smooth animations and transitions using Framer Motion for a polished, professional feel. Features include interactive 3D elements, particle effects with simplex noise, responsive design, and optimized performance. Built with TypeScript for type safety and maintainability. The application showcases advanced frontend development skills including WebGL rendering, 3D scene management, and performance optimization for complex graphics.
technicalHighlights: React Three Fiber for React integration
